permissions: Allowed for admins, broker members for the specified broker, or trucker managers associated with the broker.
side_effects: Computes the offered tender percentage for the specified broker, lineup window, and date.
validation_notes: --broker, --window, and --date are required. --window must be one of: day, night. --date must be a valid date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

flags.name: --window
flags.validation: Must be one of: day, night.

flags.name: --date
flags.validation: Must be a valid date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
